properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER

SELECT A.RNUM , A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PNO , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.SUB_PHONE , A.MEMBER_POINT , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.CHECK_BLACKLIST , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.MEMBER_NO , B.MEMBER_NAME , B.MEMBER_ID , B.MEMBER_PNO , B.MEMBER_GENDER , B.EMAIL , B.ADDRESS , B.PHONE , B.SUB_PHONE , B.MEMBER_POINT , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.MODIFIED_DATE , B.CHECK_BLACKLIST , B.MEMBER_STATUS FROM (SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PNO , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.SUB_PHONE , A.MEMBER_POINT , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.CHECK_BLACKLIST , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM MG_MEMBER A ORDER BY A.MEMBER_NO ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_ADMIN

SELECT A.RNUM , A.ADMIN_NO , A.ADMIN_NAME , A.ADMIN_ID , A.ADMIN_PNO , A.EMAIL , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.ADMIN_NO , B.ADMIN_NAME , B.ADMIN_ID , B.ADMIN_PNO , B.EMAIL , B.ENROLL_DATE , B.ADMIN_STATUS FROM (SELECT A.ADMIN_NO , A.ADMIN_NAME , A.ADMIN_ID , A.ADMIN_PNO , A.EMAIL , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.ADMIN_STATUS FROM MG_ADMIN A ORDER BY A.ADMIN_NO ) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NAME LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_ID LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_PNO LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_GENDER LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.ADDRESS LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.CHECK_BLACKLIST LIKE '%' || ? || '%'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_STATUS LIKE '%' || ? || '%'

AND ?

SELECT A.MEMBER_NO , A.MEMBER_NAME , A.MEMBER_ID , A.MEMBER_PNO , A.MEMBER_GENDER , A.EMAIL , A.ADDRESS , A.PHONE , A.SUB_PHONE , A.MEMBER_POINT , A.ENROLL_DATE , A.MODIFIED_DATE , A.CHECK_BLACKLIST , A.MEMBER_STATUS FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM MG_MEMBER_BLACKLIST A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?

SELECT A.RNUM , A.BLACKLIST_NO , A.CREATED_DATE , A.REASON_INFO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.BLACKLIST_STATUS FROM (SELECT ROWNUM RNUM , B.BLACKLIST_NO , B.CREATED_DATE , B.REASON_INFO , B.MEMBER_NO , B.BLACKLIST_STATUS FROM (SELECT A.BLACKLIST_NO , A.CREATED_DATE , A.REASON_INFO , B.MEMBER_NO , A.BLACKLIST_STATUS FROM MG_MEMBER_BLACKLIST A JOIN MG_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ? ORDER BY BLACKLIST_NO DESC) B ) A WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
SELECT A.CHECK_BLACKLIST FROM MG_MEMBER A WHERE A.MEMBER_NO = ?
INSERT INTO MG_MEMBER_BLACKLIST A ( A.BLACKLIST_NO , A.REASON_INFO , A.MEMBER_NO , A.BLACKLIST_STATUS ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_BLACKLIST_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO MG_MEMBER_MODIFY A ( A.MODIFY_NO , A.ORIGIN_COLUMN , A.ORIGIN_INFO , A.MODIFY_INFO , A.MEMBER_NO ) VALUES ( SEQ_MEM_MODIFY_NO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? , ? , ? )
UPDATE MG_MEMBER M SET M.CHECK_BLACKLIST = ? , M.MODIFIED_DATE = SYSDATE WHERE M.MEMBER_NO = ?
